key.value: You can see videos of yours here.

key.value: maximum Size of a video file

key.name: settings_max_upload_size_error
key.value: Value is incorrect or greater than server limit.

key.name: error_both_fields_empty
key.value: Iframe must be added in the code field or video file must be uploaded.

key.value: The file extension is not allowed. only mp4 format is accepted

key.value: Maximum file Size must be: {$videofilesize} Mb

key.name: delete_content_desc
key.value: Before uninstalling iisvideoplus plugin we have to remove all existing video files. This may take awhile.

key.name: confirm_delete_video_file
key.value: Are you sure you want to delete these video files?

key.name: uninstall_inprogress_desc
key.value: Please wait while all video files is being removed. This make take awhile depending on the number of video files on your site.

key.name: video_edit_upload_desc
key.value: If you want to keep the current file, you don't have to re-upload
